turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, on your way in today could you swing by Starbucks? I am in desperate need of coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! I drive near the on one Michigan Street in Grand Rapids on the way in. Is a detour okay with you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need this coffee so desperately I would pay your mileage if you had to go fifty miles out of your way.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: *chuckles* That does sound pretty desperate. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll do a grande blonde cold foam cappuccino with one pump of vanilla and half a pump of mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A blonde what now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A grande blonde cold foam cappuccino with one pump of vanilla and half a pump of mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do they do half pumps?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, they do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I'm pulling up right now, hold on. *to drive-thru speaker box* Hey, there, can I get a grande blonde cold foam cappuccino with one pump of vanilla and a half a pump of mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, make it the full pump of mocha. It's been that kind of morning.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: *to order box* I'm sorry, could you make that a full pump of mocha instead? *inaudible response from barista over speaker*

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You are really saving my life. Feel free to order whatever you want, too, my treat.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh, I'm okay, I had coffee at home.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You make your own coffee? Who does that anymore?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: *chuckles again* Lowly assistants who don't make six figures like their bosses.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Touche. Are you still waiting? Is there a long line?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm two cars from the window. Don't worry, coffee is coming!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. You're saving my life.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will be at the office soon with your grande blonde cold foam cappuccino with one pump of vanilla and one pump of mocha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Wait, which location did you say you're at again?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The one on Michigan in Grand Rapids. The receipt will be sent to your mobile soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay! Thanks. See you in a few.

items.name: blonde cold foam cappuccino with one pump of vanilla and a half a pump of mocha
